trans-unit.source: Represents the results of a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Representa os resultados de um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: The HitTestResult class represents the results of a hit test, and is exposed as the return object from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A> method call.
trans-unit.target: A classe HitTestResult representa os resultados de um teste de clique e é exposta como o objeto de retorno de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>chamada de método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hit test checks a specified point in the chart to determine if a chart element is located at that point.
trans-unit.target: Um teste de hit verifica um ponto especificado no gráfico para determinar se um elemento do gráfico está localizado nesse ponto.

trans-unit.source: If a chart element is detected, the HitTestResult class is used to obtain information about that chart element.
trans-unit.target: Se um elemento de gráfico for detectado, a classe HitTestResult é usada para obter informações sobre o elemento gráfico.

trans-unit.source: If a chart element is found, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Object%2A> property returns a reference to the chart element; the only exception to this being <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> objects, in which case the return value of this property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se for encontrado um elemento de gráfico, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Object%2A>propriedade retorna uma referência ao elemento gráfico; a única exceção a esta sendo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>objetos, caso em que o valor de retorno dessa propriedade é `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Object%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a data point is located, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A> property to get the index of that data point; that is, the zero-based index of the point in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Se um ponto de dados for localizado, você pode usar a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>propriedade para obter o índice desse ponto de dados; ou seja, o índice de base zero do ponto em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A> property to get the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object for that data point.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A>propriedade para obter o associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objeto para esse ponto de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.ChartArea%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Axis%2A> properties are used to get the associated chart area and axis of the chart element—if any—returned by the hit test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.ChartArea%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Axis%2A>propriedades são usadas para obter a área de gráfico associados e o eixo do elemento do gráfico — se qualquer — retornado pelo teste de hit.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Axis%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that these properties may be `null` if the returned chart element does not have an associated chart area or axis.
trans-unit.target: Observe que essas propriedades podem ser `null` se o elemento gráfico retornado não tem uma área de gráfico associado ou o eixo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType> property to determine the type of the chart element returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType>propriedade para determinar o tipo do elemento do gráfico retornado por um teste de ocorrências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that may be associated with a chart element returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto que pode ser associado a um elemento de gráfico retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: The presence of an associated <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object depends on whether a chart element was detected at the given location, and the type of chart element returned.
trans-unit.target: A presença de um associado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto depende se um elemento do gráfico foi detectado no local especificado e o tipo de elemento do gráfico retornado.

trans-unit.source: If the chart object returned by the hit test is an object that is associated with an axis—for example, a scrollbar element, tick mark, grid line or strip line—the Axis property will reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the returned chart object is associated.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto de gráfico retornado pelo teste de ocorrências for um objeto que está associado um eixo — por exemplo, um elemento de barra de rolagem, marca de escala, linha de grade ou faixa — a propriedade de eixo fará referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto ao qual o objeto de gráfico retornado está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, essa propriedade será `null`.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A> method can be called explicitly, in which case a chart element may or may not be at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>método pode ser chamado explicitamente, caso em que um elemento de gráfico pode ou não estar no local especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objeto, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that may be associated with a chart element returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto que pode ser associado a um elemento de gráfico retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: The presence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object depends on whether a chart element was detected at the given location, and the type of chart element returned.
trans-unit.target: A presença de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto depende se um elemento do gráfico foi detectado no local especificado e o tipo de elemento do gráfico retornado.

trans-unit.source: If a Chart object is returned by the hit test, the ChartArea property will reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object that is associated with the returned chart element.
trans-unit.target: Se um objeto de gráfico é retornado pelo teste de clique, a propriedade ChartArea fará referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto que está associado com o elemento de gráfico retornado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: If no chart element is returned by the hit test, the value of this property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum elemento de gráfico é retornado pelo teste de clique, o valor dessa propriedade será `null`.

trans-unit.source: **Note** The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A> method can be called explicitly, in which case a chart element may or may not be at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>método pode ser chamado explicitamente, caso em que um elemento de gráfico pode ou não estar no local especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objeto, caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of chart element, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de elemento do gráfico, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the type of chart element, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para determinar o tipo de elemento do gráfico, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref> enumeration value that indicates the type of chart element returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"> </xref> valor de enumeração que indica o tipo de elemento gráfico retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Defaults to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão será a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: If a chart element is located at the point that is checked by the hit test, this property will reference that chart element, otherwise the value of this property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se um elemento do gráfico está localizado no ponto em que é verificado pelo teste de clique, essa propriedade fará referência a esse elemento do gráfico, caso contrário, o valor dessa propriedade será `null`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a data point is returned by the hit test, this property will still return a `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um ponto de dados é retornado pelo teste de clique, esta propriedade retornará ainda um `null`.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the data point, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A> properties instead.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o ponto de dados, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A>Propriedades em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref:System.Object>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <xref:System.Object>, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of a data point, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de um ponto de dados, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: If a data point is at the location that is checked by a hit test, the PointIndex property will return the zero-based index of that data point, otherwise it will return a negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: Se for um ponto de dados no local que é verificado por um teste de clique, a propriedade PointIndex retornará o índice baseado em zero que do ponto de dados, caso contrário, ela retornará um resultado negativo um (-1).

trans-unit.source: All data points are stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>, which is exposed as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> collection property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object; the index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: Todos os pontos de dados são armazenados em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>, que é exposto como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A>propriedade de coleção de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objeto; o índice do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>é baseado em zero.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Points%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A> property to determine the series to which the data point belongs.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A>propriedade para determinar a série à qual pertence o ponto de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.Series%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> value that represents the index of a data point returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> valor que representa o índice de um ponto de dados retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: The default value is negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é negativo um (-1).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the associated series of a data point, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a série associada de um ponto de dados, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: If a data point is at the location checked by a hit test, this property will reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> object that the data point belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Se for um ponto de dados no local marcado por um teste de clique, essa propriedade fará referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>objeto ao qual pertence o ponto de dados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series>

trans-unit.source: If no data point is returned by the hit test, the value of this property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum ponto de dados é retornado pelo teste de clique, o valor dessa propriedade será `null`.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a returned data point, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o índice de um ponto de dados retornados, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.HitTestResult.PointIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> that a data point returned by a hit test belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> que um ponto de dados retornado por um teste de hit pertence.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the sub-object, if any, returned by a hit test.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto sub, se houver, retornado por um teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: An example of a sub-object is an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object that is displayed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um Subobjeto é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objeto que é exibido dentro de uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>

trans-unit.source: A sub-object of type <xref:System.Object>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto subtipo do tipo <xref:System.Object>, caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>
